results.content: I like to build everything from scratch

response.content: Yes! It's a good idea. But in my first section, I have used custom React Boiler template with webpack and explained it in detail. Rest of the examples are written step by step. If the same example with different data is getting repeated, I just explained it with the code. Otherwise, it's just like typing the same code again and again! I hope you will understand.

results.content: I took this course to understand complete and detailed highcharts functionalities with reactJS, this tutorial does not go to highcharts concepts and there is no detailed description of it.

response.content: Thank you for your feedback and comments. The agenda of this course was to visualize stocks and currency using highstocks. This is not a complete Highcharts course but I still did a small highcharts chart functionality with Drag n Drop. Sorry that this course wasn't up to your expectation.
